description.en: Commander of the Baron Dragoons. Though he swore to fight against the unjust king alongside his friend Cecil、 his own shortcomings lead him to become a puppet of Golbez. After coming to his senses、 he vows to reform himself and face their true enemy.
description.jp:
バロン国の精鋭部隊「竜騎士団」隊長。
親友のセシルと共に 非道な王に反旗を
ひるがえそうと誓い合ったものの 
抱いていた心の弱みにつけこまれ 
ゴルベーザの傀儡と成り果ててしまう。
我に返った後は 前向きに自分を変えて
いこうと決意 真の敵に立ち向かった。

jp.text: 寝返ったのではなく\n正気に戻ったと言ってもらおうか
空中戦はお前だけのものじゃない！
どいつも死に急ぎやがって！
やっと自分の心を\n取り戻すことができた……
……俺もこの借りは返さねばなるまい！
……その時は遠慮なく俺を斬るがいい！
戦うのはお前たちとだ！

gl.text: I've betrayed no one. I've returned to my　senses!
You're not the only one who can　ride the wind!
Finally、 I was able to regain my true self...
It would seem I have a debt to repay.
If that should happen、 kill me without a second thought.
The one I'll fight is you!

desc.en: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.gl: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.jp: 近距離物理攻撃\n相手のBRVを奪う攻撃

desc.jp: 自身のBRVを消費して\n相手のHPを削る攻撃

desc.en: Increases BRV based on Attack, then raises it by 1.2 before inflicting an HP attack.\nGrants Pride of the Dragoon for 2 turns.\nPride of the Dragoon raises Max BRV and Attack.
desc.gl: Increases BRV based on ATK, then BRV × 1.2 + HP attack\nSelf: 2 turns Dragoon's Pride\nBRV Attack becomes Jump while Dragoon's Pride active
desc.jp:
自身に自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを加算し
さらにBRVを1.2倍にアップ＋HP攻撃
自身に2ACTION「プライドオブドラグーン」付与 
「プライドオブドラグーン」付与中
通常「BRV攻撃」が「ジャンプ」に変化

name.jp: ジャンプIIIエクステンド

desc.en:
[Jump III] use +1

When using [Jump III]:
• Moderately raises BRV gain based on Attack
• Adds a 4-HIT AoE ranged BRV attack after gaining BRV
• Moderately raises BRV damage dealt when attacking single target
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
• Slightly improves effects of [Pride of Dragoon] and extend its duration by 2 turns

When using [Jump]:
• Becomes AoE
• BRV attack hit count becomes 2
• Greatly raises total BRV potency
• Moderately raises BRV damage dealt when attacking single target
desc.gl:
Jump III use +1

When using Jump III:
 • Moderate boost to BRV granted based on ATK
 • Additional 4-hit group ranged BRV attack after BRV multiplier
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
 • Slightly boosts Dragoon's Pride; duration +2

When using Jump:
 • Becomes group attack; BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
desc.jp:
「ジャンプIII」の使用回数＋1

「ジャンプIII」使用時
・攻撃力依存のBRV加算量中アップ
・自身のBRVを乗算した後に
　4HIT全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃を追加
・攻撃対象が単体の時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分

　合計BRV威力も大アップ

name.jp: ジャンプIIIエクステンド

desc.gl:
Jump III use +1

When using Jump III:
 • Moderate boost to BRV granted based on ATK
 • Additional 4-hit group ranged BRV attack after BRV multiplier
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
 • Slightly boosts Dragoon's Pride; duration +2

When using Jump:
 • Becomes group attack; BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target

・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・ターゲット以外にも50％分のHPダメージ
・「プライドオブドラグーン」の効果が小アップし
　2ACTION期間延長

desc.en:
When using [Fang and Claw]:
• BRV attack hit count becomes 10
• Tremendously raises total BRV potency
• Raises allies' BRV based on HP damage dealt
• Delays all enemies by 1 turn

While [Pride of Dragoon] is active, [HP Attack] becomes [HP Attack+]:
• Raises BRV based on Max BRV before attacking
• 3-HIT ranged BRV attack + HP attack
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• Extends current buffs by 1 turn
desc.gl:
When using Fang and Claw:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 10; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Grants allies BRV based on HP damage dealt
 • Delays all targets 1 turn

While Dragoon's Pride active
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (increases BRV based on ATK; 3-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; extends own buff duration 1 turn)

　合計BRV威力も極大アップ

　自身以外の味方全員に加算
・敵全体の行動順を1つ下げる

通常「HP攻撃」が以下の「HP攻撃＋」に変化
・自身に自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを加算し
